about_the_game:
⠀
Chromatic Shift is an action-filled, minimalistic rogue-lite game where you are the master of colors! Utilize the power of colors to become ultra-powerful. Defeat waves of strange and unearthly creatures, uncover the truth of this world you find yourself in, and build power with your favorite color combinations.

Choose your Color

Use the selection of 12 colors with unique abilities and powers to find a playstyle that suits you. Be defensive, be offensive, be fast, fight in flames, control their minds, or just do a bit of it all! It is up to you to become a powerful, creature-destroying machine.
⠀

COMBOS!

Combine any two of the 9 sub colors to create a new ability that harnesses the power of both colors. With 36 different combinations to try out, there's plenty of room for experimentation and finding the combos that suit you! Mix, match, and combine, do it how you like!
⠀

Keep on trying!

Enemies are powerful too and will come for you relentlessly, it is okay to fail, as long as you come back harder and stronger. Collect points during your battles to unlock colors and buy skill tree upgrades. Upgrade your favorite colors to higher strengths and unlock interesting new abilities. Show those enemies that you don't give up!
⠀

Powerups

In your battles, choose a diverse range of power-ups to further customize and strengthen your playstyle.
⠀

Dungeon Mode

Step aside from your adventures through the story and enter dungeons. Take on the randomly generated rogue-lite experience, defeating enemies, finding upgrades, and progressing through the stages! Playthroughs of dungeons will also provide you with points that you can spend on unlocking colors and upgrading your skill tree. So, if you're stuck or looking for a quick break from the main levels, give Dungeons a go!
⠀

short_description: Destroy thousands of unearthly creatures and machines, and progress through the strange world you find yourself in. Chromatic Shift is a small rogue-lite game where you mix and match powerful colors to create your perfect build of abilities. Find your favorite combinations and become powerful!
